subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Steve Hultay Files/Steve Hultay's Frank's Box #27/steve's_gonna_die_horrible (Slowed down 10%).mp3 
  Uploaded by : urkel232002 <urkel23@...> 
  Description : "Steve's Gonna Die Horrible"---Does anybody else hear this?---Slowed it down another 10 percent 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Steve%20Hultay%20Files/Steve%20Hultay%27s%20Frank%27s%20Box%20%2327/steve%27s_gonna_die_horrible%20%28Slowed%20down%2010%25%29.mp3
